entry.source: I would like to hire someone to bring me a{F801}relic. The electric refrigerator in my shop{F801}has broken, and soon all I'll be able to{F801}serve is jerky. So, I'll start the usual{F801}competition: whoever brings me one of these{F801}magic {F804,5}refrigerators{F804,0} first wins a prize.{F801}
